channel.title: Slayer Point Help!
channel.description: hello i need help how i make a item cost slayer points on my "project insaity" server please help me!

item.title: Slayer Point Help!
item.dc:creator: @coola99 coola99
item.description:
@coola99 wrote:

what i change here? —> if (c.myShopId == 8) {
if (c.spPoints >= getSpecialItemValue(itemID)) {
if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0){
c.spPoints -= getSpecialItemValue(itemID);
c.getItems().addItem(itemID,1);
c.getItems().resetItems(3825);
}[quote=“Ashton51, post:2, topic:386881”]You need to take that link out of your post, you are not allowed to advertise your server here.

And to answer your question,
To make an item sell for a special currency then open your ShopAssistant class,

These are the methods you are going to need to modify,

buyFromShopPrice()
buyItem()
handleOtherShop()

and the integer getSpecialItemValue[/quote][quote=“Ashton51, post:2, topic:386881”]You need to take that link out of your post, you are not allowed to advertise your server here.

And to answer your question,
To make an item sell for a special currency then open your ShopAssistant class,

These are the methods you are going to need to modify,

buyFromShopPrice()
buyItem()
handleOtherShop()

and the integer getSpecialItemValue[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Slayer Point Help!
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

You need to take that link out of your post, you are not allowed to advertise your server here.

And to answer your question,
To make an item sell for a special currency then open your ShopAssistant class,

These are the methods you are going to need to modify,

buyFromShopPrice()
buyItem()
handleOtherShop()

and the integer getSpecialItemValue

Read full topic
